bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Writing jin kou li 噤口痢. Pathological Condition of li ji 痢疾 , free-flux illness, accompanied by an inability to eat, with food that has just been eaten being thrown up again. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 6: 真料參苓白朮 散，治禁口痢，食飲不下 , “The powder with genuine ingredients [ ren ] shen and [ fu ] ling and bai zhu cures clenched jaw with free-flux illness with an inability to drink and eat”.
